p: Differences among sample prevalence from different years and species were assessed fitting generalized linear models with a logit link function, using the status on PPR antibodies with a binomial distribution as a response variable and setting significance at 0.05. The prevalence of antibodies in livestock species was estimated using sensitivity and specificity of the test, and calculated together with confidence intervals using the EpiR package [ 46]. All data analyses and graphs (ggplot2) were performed with R statistical software [ 47]. The maps and distance of sampling points to protected areas from western Uganda was done with QGIS [ 48].
